# Crafting

## Utility scripts

A set of scripts to allow choosing which tier to focus on:

GLOBAL_TIERINIT (1 action)
`D2dsb2JhbF90aWVyaW5pdAEAAAAGd2FrZXVwAAAAAAEAAAAOZ2xvYmFsLmludC5zZXQIY29uc3RhbnQEBHRpZXIIY29uc3RhbnQCAQAAAA==`

GLOBAL_DOWNTIER (1 action, 1 condition, impulse on '1')
`D2dsb2JhbF9kb3dudGllcgEAAAAFa2V5LjEBAAAADmNvbXBhcmlzb24uaW50Dmdsb2JhbC5pbnQuZ2V0CGNvbnN0YW50BAR0aWVyCGNvbnN0YW50BAE+CGNvbnN0YW50AgEAAAABAAAADmdsb2JhbC5pbnQuc2V0CGNvbnN0YW50BAR0aWVyDmFyaXRobWV0aWMuaW50Dmdsb2JhbC5pbnQuZ2V0CGNvbnN0YW50BAR0aWVyCGNvbnN0YW50BAEtCGNvbnN0YW50AgEAAAA=`

GLOBAL_UPTIER (1 action, 1 condition, impulse on '2')
`DWdsb2JhbF91cHRpZXIBAAAABWtleS4yAQAAAA5jb21wYXJpc29uLmludA5nbG9iYWwuaW50LmdldAhjb25zdGFudAQEdGllcghjb25zdGFudAQBPAhjb25zdGFudAIKAAAAAQAAAA5nbG9iYWwuaW50LnNldAhjb25zdGFudAQEdGllcg5hcml0aG1ldGljLmludA5nbG9iYWwuaW50LmdldAhjb25zdGFudAQEdGllcghjb25zdGFudAQBKwhjb25zdGFudAIBAAAA`


This script prevents any of the action scripts from running if you're not in the factory:

LOC_SET_FACTORY (1 action, impulse on enter factory)
`D0xPQ19TRVRfRkFDVE9SWQEAAAAMb3Blbi5mYWN0b3J5AAAAAAEAAAAOZ2xvYmFsLmludC5zZXQIY29uc3RhbnQECGxvY2F0aW9uCGNvbnN0YW50AgMAAAA=`

## Production scripts

Produce a stack of plates (this is basically the only recipe that requires jumping out of the current recipe to easily produce multiple)

FACTORY_CRAFT_PLATESTACK (2 actions, impulse on '0' when in factory)
``

FACTORY_CRAFT_CHIP (1 action, impulse on '3' when in factory) - edit the script to change how many to produce
`EmZhY3RvcnlfY3JhZnRfY2hpcAEAAAAFa2V5LjMBAAAADmNvbXBhcmlzb24uaW50Dmdsb2JhbC5pbnQuZ2V0CGNvbnN0YW50BAhsb2NhdGlvbghjb25zdGFudAQCPT0IY29uc3RhbnQCAwAAAAEAAAATZ2VuZXJpYy5leGVjdXRlc3luYwZjb25jYXQIY29uc3RhbnQEDGZhY3RvcnlfY2hpcANpMnMOZ2xvYmFsLmludC5nZXQIY29uc3RhbnQEBHRpZXI=`

FACTORY_CHIP1 (10 actions)
``

FACTORY_CHIP1_PART2 (8 actions)
``

FACTORY_CHIP2 (10 actions)
``

FACTORY_CHIP2_PART2 (8 actions)
``
